cn.trackName: 紫白飛星萬年曆 - 十三行作品
cn.description:
"紫白飞星万年历 - 十三行作品" 为玄学爱好者与专业人士设计，提供详细的紫白飞星资料和丰富的传统中国历法资讯。 新版增强了公众假期显示、书签功能，提供更加精准的风水布局。

• 紫白飞星资讯：详细列出年、月、日、时的紫白飞星。
• 男女命卦：提供男女命卦资讯，提升风水布局准确性。
• 书签功能：允许将多个日期加入书签，方便比较和查看。
• 显示所选日期的四柱：包括年、月、日、时干支，支援早夜子设定。
• 节气变化明细显示：详细列出节气前后紫白飞星的变化，帮助用户更准确地进行安排和决策。
• 当月节气时间显示：清晰展示重要的节气变化。
• 公众假期显示：支持中国、香港、台湾、新加坡的公众假期资讯，帮助您更有效选择吉日。
• 西历及农历日期搜寻及转换功能：支持1850至2150年间的西历与农历转换。
• 多语言介面：提供繁体中文和简体中文选项。
• 设定：北(坎)方向、飞星颜色、排列方式的设定选项。
• 日期四柱算法：可设定早夜子。
• 日飞星计算法依据传统歌诀: 日家紫白不难求，二十四气六宫周，冬至阳生前后节，顺行甲子一宫移， 雨水便从七宫起，谷雨还从四绿推， 阴生夏至九宫逆，处暑前后三碧是， 霜降六宫起甲子，顺逆分明十二支，有是何星当值日，移入中宫顺逆飞。

欢迎提供意见可 Email 到 hello@firm13.com 或在 App Store 留言。

8、修正亡灵凯尔特女妖上臂环00改颜色只有一边变色的问题；

cn.description:
一款近乎真实、专业的战争模拟游戏！置身战略军事沙盒中，畅享接近现实的物理引擎。Landfall官方授权，Steam超12万条玩家评测，97%好评率，在游戏中排兵布阵，战术演练，带给你身临其境的战争体验。

游戏基于PC原版移植，买断制发售，并针对手机玩家的操作和观看体验做出专门优化。

【史诗级的战役演出】
在战役模式中，巧妙利用地图地形和兵种阵容，制定花式布兵打法投入战场。由于“超现实”的物理引擎效果，战斗中将会迸发许多意料之外的状况；拉进镜头，切换子弹时间，好戏才刚刚上演！

【100+天马行空的兵种】
游戏提供百余种性能（性格）各不相同的兵种，来自各个派系、时代文明和神话传说。从发射尖刺的仙人掌到召唤分身耍棍的孙悟空，这些“训练有素”的战士能够对战局起到蝴蝶效应般的影响。

【自定义沙盒，兵种DIY】
不满足于挑战既定的战役？玩转沙盒模式，自由切换地图，自定义战局和对战阵容，随意拿捏自己想要的兵种属性、服装，和武器技能，打造独一无二的奇迹憨憨军团演绎精彩战斗。

【支持联机】
手机版加入联机对战模式和房间大厅；随机匹配，又或是邀请好友尽情切磋！

cn.description:
十年不忘初心，官方正版经典再升级！
原版复刻端游，好玩又保值，永不关服！
布拉格公会强势回归，兄弟我在正版传奇等你！


2024官方正版传奇今日盛大首发！原版PC游戏内容1:1复刻重制，经典全职业-道法战回归。多系统复古玩法，游戏中多种复古写实场景可供玩家随意切换，多种酷炫魔幻的守护装备可在怪物中爆落。自由打金兄弟齐聚，燃情沙城争霸！

【游戏玩法】
— PK爆装 跨服竞技
自由PK，蛮荒古城，跨服争霸，多人竞技，与其他服抢夺资源，争夺BOSS！
杀人爆装、野外红名、镖车护送、领地争夺、激情攻沙丰富的PvP玩法！
— 轻松挂机 装备保值 
护肝玩法，轻松挂机升级，等级永不落后！
装备道具直接掉落，稀世装备永久保值！
— 自由交易 散人天堂
超激情打宝神器，爆极品装备、绚丽法阵高级技能刷怪！
装备保值自由交易，打造散人天堂！
— 新增玩法 激爽一夏
卧龙山庄勇闯天关，BOSS悬赏皇陵秘境，刀刀屠龙刀刀切割！

【特色系统】
— 副本系统：
全新副本，重磅来袭，等着玩家去探索和体验，和兄弟一起并肩作战吧！
— 装备系统：
装备可通过洗练获得随机属性；武器、衣服、项链、勋章、手镯、戒指、腰带、鞋子、玉佩、疗伤石等装备可通过镶嵌宝石提升装备属性。装备阶数：沃玛、祖玛、赤月、雷霆、战神、火龙、通云、金牛、主宰、传奇、热血、真龙、神龙、GM系列，可通过镶嵌宝石提高属性。
— 转生系统：
自由转生，转生神翼，万人膜拜，可增加角色生命值和攻击穿戴更高等级装备进入更高等级地图。
— 法觉系统：
炫酷法阵必不可少，增强法阵属性，轻松过渡前中期，法阵专属外观，让你在万人面前闪闪发光。
— 封号系统：
消耗功勋可提升封号等级，升级后可获得大量属性加成和封号称号显示。

cn.releaseNotes:
New! Local Data Health feature in Settings > Storage
Fixes for Object validation in Observations and Observing Lists
Open Cluster radial velocity fixed
cn.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

hk.description:
1985年，一場無法挽回的災難降臨——核戰爭和致命病毒的爆發導致了世界末日，將整個世界變成了一片巨大的放射性荒原，充斥著突變體、掠奪者和瘋子（他們比任何僵尸都可怕）。蘇聯在核打擊中崩潰，整個世界變成了一個每個人都在為生存而戰的競技場。

在一個充滿輻射和怪物的世界中生存並不容易。如今，在昔日世界的廢墟上，暴力、飢餓和疾病統治著一切。作為一名幸存者，你必須在這個對生命充滿敵意的開放世界中適應環境，並尋找和拯救你的家人——也許他們在這場混亂中幸存了下來？……

危險與冒險在每一個轉角等著你。作為一名潛行者，你需要在輻射水平比切爾諾貝利災難還要高數倍的廢棄城市中搜尋物資，並在充滿嗜血突變體和僵尸瘋子的森林中穿行。在這片混亂與廢墟中，你必須運用所有的生存技能，獨自為生命而戰！

《Day R Survival》不僅僅是一款游戲，而是一款真實的核末日生存模擬游戲，背景設定在1985年蘇聯的廣闊而真實的地圖上。

《Day R Survival》的RPG和任務系統是一款硬核的生存模擬RPG。核戰爭和致命病毒（比任何僵尸病毒都可怕）不僅會給你帶來強大而狡猾的敵人，還會讓你面臨艱難的選擇。游戲中的任務充滿了陰暗的氛圍和絕望，人們不得不在昔日世界的廢墟上掙扎求生。


廣闊的開放世界
在1985年蘇聯的逼真地圖上，探索超過2700個廢棄城市。這些城市充滿了資源、危險（如突變體、野生動物和瘋狂的僵尸）以及未解之謎。你可以在森林中狩獵，在河流中釣魚，或是掠奪資源——在這個世界裡，你的生存策略沒有任何限制！

物品制作
數百種真實的制作配方：從日常用品到頂級軍用交通工具和彈藥。你擁有機械、化學、物理或生存方面的知識嗎？現在是時候運用它們了！

在殘酷世界中掙扎求生
你隻是一個普通人，需要食物、水和休息。你會染上疾病，傷口也不會自行愈合。尋找食物，爭奪每一滴干淨的水，建造避難所，並時刻保持警惕——在這個世界上，哪怕是一隻老鼠，都可能要了你的命！


單人模式與多人聯機
你可以獨自挑戰任務，也可以與朋友並肩作戰——隨時在單人和多人模式之間切換，選擇最適合你的生存方式。打造獨特的生存策略，或與志同道合的玩家聯手，通過聊天交流、交易物資，並在末世荒原中共同完成任務，尋找生存的希望。


游戲特色  
在線與離線模式
多人在線生存，與好友組隊挑戰末世危機
難度選擇：簡單、普通、困難，適應不同生存策略
技能成長與強化
動態環境：四季更迭、晝夜交替、輻射水平不斷變化
敵人與資源隨機刷新
逼真廢土氛圍，沉浸式核戰后世界生存挑戰


幸存者！體驗最真實的生存模擬游戲之一——Day R Survival。制定你的生存策略，揭開末日世界的重重謎團，努力活下去！

hk.description:
"紫白飛星萬年曆 - 十三行作品" 為玄學愛好者與專業人士設計，提供詳細的紫白飛星資料和豐富的傳統中國曆法資訊。新版增強了公眾假期顯示、書簽功能，提供更加精準的風水佈局。

• 紫白飛星資訊：詳細列出年、月、日、時的紫白飛星。
• 男女命卦：提供男女命卦資訊，提升風水佈局準確性。
• 書簽功能：允許將多個日期加入書簽，方便比較和查看。
• 顯示所選日期的四柱：包括年、月、日、時干支，支援早夜子設定。
• 節氣變化明細顯示：詳細列出節氣前後紫白飛星的變化，幫助用戶更準確地進行安排和決策。
• 當月節氣時間顯示：清晰展示重要的節氣變化。
• 公眾假期顯示：支持中國、香港、台灣、新加坡的公眾假期資訊，幫助您更有效選擇吉日。
• 西曆及農曆日期搜尋及轉換功能：支持1850至2150年間的西曆與農曆轉換。
• 多語言介面：提供繁體中文和簡體中文選項。
• 設定：北(坎)方向、飛星顏色、排列方式的設定選項。
• 日期四柱算法：可設定早夜子。
• 日飛星計算法依據傳統歌訣: 日家紫白不難求，二十四氣六宮周，冬至陽生前後節，順行甲子一宮移， 雨水便從七宮起，谷雨還從四綠推，陰生夏至九宮逆，處暑前後三碧是， 霜降六宮起甲子，順逆分明十二支，有是何星當值日，移入中宮順逆飛。

歡迎提供意見可 Email 到 hello@firm13.com 或在 App Store 留言。

hk.description:
********************
勇者鬥惡龍天空系列的第二作，《勇者鬥惡龍V》隆重登場！
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事將在智能手機上復蘇！
感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”！
本作是一次性買斷的！
在下載後，不需要再支付任何費用。
********************
◆序言
主人公是和父親帕帕斯一起在世界中旅行的少年。
少年在經歷了無數冒險後，逐漸成長成了青年，
踏上了繼承父親理想，尋找“天空的勇者”的旅程

感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”。
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事在智能手機上復蘇。

◆遊戲特色
・怪物夥伴系統
作為敵人與主人公戰鬥的怪物，這回將成為夥伴！
只有怪物才能使用的特技和各種咒文，將做出非常出色的表現。

・夥伴對話
可以體驗與個性豐富的夥伴們在冒險中對話的樂趣。
對話的內容會根據遊戲的進展和狀況發生各種變化！

・３６０度旋轉地圖
在鎮子和城堡中可以使地圖３６０度旋轉。
如果旋轉起來觀察的話，說不定會有新的發現？！

・ＡＩ戰鬥
值得信賴的夥伴們可以通過自己的意志進行戰鬥。
根據不同狀況使用各種“作戦”，去面對強大的敵人吧！

・賭場
有老虎機、撲克、怪物格鬥場、史萊姆賽跑這些熟悉的娛樂要素。
在漫長的旅途中也勞逸結合地娛樂一下吧。
賺到的代幣還可以兌換道具，可謂是一箭雙雕！

・雙六台
在投擲骰子，使自己成為棋子前進的巨大“雙六台”中，
在駐足的格子中會發生各種各樣的事件。
裡面還有只有在“雙六”中才能體驗到的特殊事件？！
順利走到終點的話，還可以得到稀有的道具哦！！

・觸摸史萊姆
在任天堂DS版《DQV》中登場的“觸摸史萊姆”還健在！
觸擊在一定時間內顯示的與面板顏色相同的史萊姆的非常簡單的遊戲！
不過，因而玩得入了迷的話，就會忘記時間，難以自拔。真是個高深莫測的遊戲！

--------------------
【適用OS】
iOS11.0以上

【適用機型】
iPhone5S／iPod touch(第6代)／iPad(第5代) 以上

邪惡的龍王打破了阿雷夫加爾德的和平，他奪走了光之石，令世界陷入了無盡的黑暗之中。

《勇者鬥惡龍X OFFLINE》中文版登陸智慧型手機！

《勇者鬥惡龍X　OFFLINE》終於推出中文版！
在「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中，親身體驗壯大的冒險！

◆玩家的靈魂將轉生至「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中
＜冒險的舞台＞
本作中展開冒險的舞台是由五個大陸與數個島嶼組成的世界「雅斯特露琪亞」。
主角（玩家）將遊歷五個種族居住的各個大陸，
與夥伴們一起踏上旅程，拯救逐漸被魔瘴侵蝕的雅斯特露琪亞！

【資料下載注意事項】
※欲遊玩遊戲本篇，需要額外下載約9GB的資料。
※建議盡可能在良好的連線環境下進行下載。

◆超大型擴充下載內容
描繪了本篇結束後故事，內容豐厚的超大型擴充下載內容「勇者鬥惡龍X　沉睡的勇者與引導的盟友　OFFLINE」也與本篇同步推出！
在「冷達西亞」編織出你和勇者之間關於羈絆的故事吧。

＜冒險的舞台＞
為了見到古蘭澤朵拉王國的「勇者公主」，主角（玩家）將乘坐豪華遊輪「大巨人號」前往全新的冒險舞台——冷達西亞大地！
之後為了達到某個目的，你需要一邊聽取神秘青年庫洛茲的建議，一邊周遊各地，並逐步接近新大陸的「謎團」。

【超大型擴充下載內容相關注意事項】

※超大型擴充下載內容需要連接網路才能下載。
※若要推進超大型擴充下載內容的故事，則必須先將《勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE》本篇遊玩至結局。

◆系統需求
iOS：13.0以上，推薦使用系統記憶體 6GB 以上的機型

【運作相關注意事項】
※ 根據您的裝置性能、規格，或是其他應用程式的使用情況，可能會發生強制結束等意料之外的問題。

hk.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

Fixes for Object validation in Observations and Observing Lists
Open Cluster radial velocity fixed
hk.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

"紫白飛星萬年曆 - 十三行作品" 為玄學愛好者與專業人士設計，提供詳細的紫白飛星資料和豐富的傳統中國曆法資訊。新版增強了公眾假期顯示、書簽功能，提供更加精準的風水佈局。

• 紫白飛星資訊：詳細列出年、月、日、時的紫白飛星。
• 男女命卦：提供男女命卦資訊，提升風水佈局準確性。
• 書簽功能：允許將多個日期加入書簽，方便比較和查看。
• 顯示所選日期的四柱：包括年、月、日、時干支，支援早夜子設定。
• 節氣變化明細顯示：詳細列出節氣前後紫白飛星的變化，幫助用戶更準確地進行安排和決策。
• 當月節氣時間顯示：清晰展示重要的節氣變化。
• 公眾假期顯示：支持中國、香港、台灣、新加坡的公眾假期資訊，幫助您更有效選擇吉日。
• 西曆及農曆日期搜尋及轉換功能：支持1850至2150年間的西曆與農曆轉換。
• 多語言介面：提供繁體中文和簡體中文選項。
• 設定：北(坎)方向、飛星顏色、排列方式的設定選項。
• 日期四柱算法：可設定早夜子。
• 日飛星計算法依據傳統歌訣: 日家紫白不難求，二十四氣六宮周，冬至陽生前後節，順行甲子一宮移， 雨水便從七宮起，谷雨還從四綠推，陰生夏至九宮逆，處暑前後三碧是， 霜降六宮起甲子，順逆分明十二支，有是何星當值日，移入中宮順逆飛。

advisories: 偶爾/輕度的暴力卡通或幻想
mo.description:
********************
勇者鬥惡龍天空系列的第二作，《勇者鬥惡龍V》隆重登場！
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事將在智能手機上復蘇！
感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”！
本作是一次性買斷的！
在下載後，不需要再支付任何費用。
********************
◆序言
主人公是和父親帕帕斯一起在世界中旅行的少年。
少年在經歷了無數冒險後，逐漸成長成了青年，
踏上了繼承父親理想，尋找“天空的勇者”的旅程

感受主人公所經歷的“波瀾萬丈的人生”。
歷經祖孫三代的宏大故事在智能手機上復蘇。

◆遊戲特色
・怪物夥伴系統
作為敵人與主人公戰鬥的怪物，這回將成為夥伴！
只有怪物才能使用的特技和各種咒文，將做出非常出色的表現。

・夥伴對話
可以體驗與個性豐富的夥伴們在冒險中對話的樂趣。
對話的內容會根據遊戲的進展和狀況發生各種變化！

・３６０度旋轉地圖
在鎮子和城堡中可以使地圖３６０度旋轉。
如果旋轉起來觀察的話，說不定會有新的發現？！

・ＡＩ戰鬥
值得信賴的夥伴們可以通過自己的意志進行戰鬥。
根據不同狀況使用各種“作戦”，去面對強大的敵人吧！

・賭場
有老虎機、撲克、怪物格鬥場、史萊姆賽跑這些熟悉的娛樂要素。
在漫長的旅途中也勞逸結合地娛樂一下吧。
賺到的代幣還可以兌換道具，可謂是一箭雙雕！

・雙六台
在投擲骰子，使自己成為棋子前進的巨大“雙六台”中，
在駐足的格子中會發生各種各樣的事件。
裡面還有只有在“雙六”中才能體驗到的特殊事件？！
順利走到終點的話，還可以得到稀有的道具哦！！

・觸摸史萊姆
在任天堂DS版《DQV》中登場的“觸摸史萊姆”還健在！
觸擊在一定時間內顯示的與面板顏色相同的史萊姆的非常簡單的遊戲！
不過，因而玩得入了迷的話，就會忘記時間，難以自拔。真是個高深莫測的遊戲！

--------------------
【適用OS】
iOS11.0以上

【適用機型】
iPhone5S／iPod touch(第6代)／iPad(第5代) 以上

mo.description:
********************

《勇者鬥惡龍》系列開山之作終於登陸手機！快來體會吸引了兩代人的經典RPG的不朽魅力！

通過這款遊戲，你可以進入一個劍與魔法的完整世界！只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！

********************

◆ 序言
邪惡的龍王打破了阿雷夫加爾德的和平，他奪走了光之石，令世界陷入了無盡的黑暗之中。
是時候了，繼承了洛特血脈的年輕人啊，發揮出你體內蘊藏的勇者之力，打敗龍王拯救世界吧！

◆ 遊戲特色
·系列首作
體會最初的經典，重溫數百萬日本玩家在上世紀80年代時的感動。
化身為傳說中的勇者洛特的後人，在阿雷夫戈爾德的大地上感受一段經典的冒險之旅。消滅阻礙的敵人，解開重重謎題，前往龍王的所在地！

·簡便的直接操作
遊戲操作經過調整可以完美對應現代移動設備的縱向佈局，移動按鍵的位置也可以在單手與雙手中切換。

·與日本乃至全世界數以百萬計的玩家一起回顧這款傳奇般的RPG！由著名遊戲製作人堀井雄二先生，偉大的作曲家椙山浩一先生，以及漫畫大師鳥山明先生攜手帶來的經典。

--------------------
◆ 推薦機型及系統 ◆
・iPhone 4及以後的機型／iPad／iPod touch (第4代及以後的機型)
・iOS4.3及更高版本

mo.description:
◆這是能離線遊玩的《勇者鬥惡龍X》的「故事」
《勇者鬥惡龍X OFFLINE》中文版登陸智慧型手機！

《勇者鬥惡龍X　OFFLINE》終於推出中文版！
在「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中，親身體驗壯大的冒險！

◆玩家的靈魂將轉生至「雅斯特露琪亞」的世界中
＜冒險的舞台＞
本作中展開冒險的舞台是由五個大陸與數個島嶼組成的世界「雅斯特露琪亞」。
主角（玩家）將遊歷五個種族居住的各個大陸，
與夥伴們一起踏上旅程，拯救逐漸被魔瘴侵蝕的雅斯特露琪亞！

【資料下載注意事項】
※欲遊玩遊戲本篇，需要額外下載約9GB的資料。
※建議盡可能在良好的連線環境下進行下載。

◆超大型擴充下載內容
描繪了本篇結束後故事，內容豐厚的超大型擴充下載內容「勇者鬥惡龍X　沉睡的勇者與引導的盟友　OFFLINE」也與本篇同步推出！
在「冷達西亞」編織出你和勇者之間關於羈絆的故事吧。

＜冒險的舞台＞
為了見到古蘭澤朵拉王國的「勇者公主」，主角（玩家）將乘坐豪華遊輪「大巨人號」前往全新的冒險舞台——冷達西亞大地！
之後為了達到某個目的，你需要一邊聽取神秘青年庫洛茲的建議，一邊周遊各地，並逐步接近新大陸的「謎團」。

【超大型擴充下載內容相關注意事項】
※超大型擴充下載內容須另行付費購買。
※超大型擴充下載內容需要連接網路才能下載。
※若要推進超大型擴充下載內容的故事，則必須先將《勇者鬥惡龍X　覺醒的五種族　OFFLINE》本篇遊玩至結局。

◆系統需求
iOS：13.0以上，推薦使用系統記憶體 6GB 以上的機型

【運作相關注意事項】
※ 根據您的裝置性能、規格，或是其他應用程式的使用情況，可能會發生強制結束等意料之外的問題。
※ 若遊戲畫面出現異常或運作延遲，可嘗試調整圖像設定以進行改善。

mo.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍》系列第二款作品終於也登陸手機！快來探索《勇者鬥惡龍II　惡靈之神》的奇妙世界及四個經典迷宮！

本作是一個完整的幻想世界，在裡面您可以體會到每個武器的奇妙，感受到每個咒文的壯觀。
而這一切都是買斷的，只需下載一次，便不用再購買也不用再下載任何其他東西！

◆ 序言
在初代《勇者鬥惡龍》故事的100年之後，阿雷夫加爾德大地上已經建立起3個新的國家。然而長久以來的和平即將被打破，邪惡的大神官哈貢召喚來邪惡的魔物，再次將破壞與災難帶到這個世界之上。
此時，傳說中的勇者洛特的後裔，羅蕾西亞城的年輕王子挺身而出，他要找到另外兩個血脈的繼承人，共同打倒邪惡的哈貢，讓世界恢復和平。

◆ 遊戲特色
·無論是感受過勇者洛特三部曲第一部的老朋友，還是對整個系列都很陌生的新面孔，都能夠在這款遊戲中體會到一次難以忘記的旅行。

·在這個早期的開放世界冒險中，玩家可以在野外自由探索，也可以挑戰充滿魔物的迷宮，甚至還能跨越大海前往新大陸！

mo.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

mo.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

在投擲骰子，使自己成為棋子前進的巨大“雙六台”中，
在駐足的格子中會發生各種各樣的事件。
裡面還有只有在“雙六”中才能體驗到的特殊事件？！
順利走到終點的話，還可以得到稀有的道具哦！！

・觸摸史萊姆
在任天堂DS版《DQV》中登場的“觸摸史萊姆”還健在！
觸擊在一定時間內顯示的與面板顏色相同的史萊姆的非常簡單的遊戲！
不過，因而玩得入了迷的話，就會忘記時間，難以自拔。真是個高深莫測的遊戲！

--------------------
【適用OS】
iOS11.0以上

【適用機型】
iPhone5S／iPod touch(第6代)／iPad(第5代) 以上

tw.description:
《勇者鬥惡龍》系列第二款作品終於也登陸手機！快來探索《勇者鬥惡龍II　惡靈之神》的奇妙世界及四個經典迷宮！

本作是一個完整的幻想世界，在裡面您可以體會到每個武器的奇妙，感受到每個咒文的壯觀。

在初代《勇者鬥惡龍》故事的100年之後，阿雷夫加爾德大地上已經建立起3個新的國家。然而長久以來的和平即將被打破，邪惡的大神官哈貢召喚來邪惡的魔物，再次將破壞與災難帶到這個世界之上。
此時，傳說中的勇者洛特的後裔，羅蕾西亞城的年輕王子挺身而出，他要找到另外兩個血脈的繼承人，共同打倒邪惡的哈貢，讓世界恢復和平。

·無論是感受過勇者洛特三部曲第一部的老朋友，還是對整個系列都很陌生的新面孔，都能夠在這款遊戲中體會到一次難以忘記的旅行。

tw.description:
Traverse the dungeon in this awesome action roguelite bullet hell inspired by The Binding Of Isaac and Tiny Rogues, where every choice could make or break your run. Stack over 100 different items and create powerful synergies to become truly overpowered with over 10 unique characters!

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

BECOME OVERPOWERED
Over a hundred unique items can be mixed and matched to create a devastating build, laying waste to every enemy in sight! Be careful not to hurt yourself with an item that doesn't fit, and experiment with synergies to become an overpowered behemoth!​

FIND SECRETS
Uncover the secrets of the dungeon on your quest to slay the Villian to unlock hidden paths, uncover new items, and grow your band of adventurers! And for those who crave a challenge, the greatest rewards are locked behind the greatest trials!

PLAY WITH FRIENDS
Play solo or with others in local co-op, with up to 4 people! Combine character abilities to improve your odds, or do a mild amount of trolling, the choice is yours!

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

tw.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.apple.com/legal/internet-services/itunes/dev/stdeula/

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

us.trackName: 紫白飛星萬年曆 - 十三行作品
us.description:
"紫白飛星萬年曆 - 十三行作品" 為玄學愛好者與專業人士設計，提供詳細的紫白飛星資料和豐富的傳統中國曆法資訊。新版增強了公眾假期顯示、書簽功能，提供更加精準的風水佈局。

• 紫白飛星資訊：詳細列出年、月、日、時的紫白飛星。
• 男女命卦：提供男女命卦資訊，提升風水佈局準確性。
• 書簽功能：允許將多個日期加入書簽，方便比較和查看。
• 顯示所選日期的四柱：包括年、月、日、時干支，支援早夜子設定。
• 節氣變化明細顯示：詳細列出節氣前後紫白飛星的變化，幫助用戶更準確地進行安排和決策。
• 當月節氣時間顯示：清晰展示重要的節氣變化。
• 公眾假期顯示：支持中國、香港、台灣、新加坡的公眾假期資訊，幫助您更有效選擇吉日。
• 西曆及農曆日期搜尋及轉換功能：支持1850至2150年間的西曆與農曆轉換。
• 多語言介面：提供繁體中文和簡體中文選項。
• 設定：北(坎)方向、飛星顏色、排列方式的設定選項。
• 日期四柱算法：可設定早夜子。
• 日飛星計算法依據傳統歌訣: 日家紫白不難求，二十四氣六宮周，冬至陽生前後節，順行甲子一宮移， 雨水便從七宮起，谷雨還從四綠推，陰生夏至九宮逆，處暑前後三碧是， 霜降六宮起甲子，順逆分明十二支，有是何星當值日，移入中宮順逆飛。

歡迎提供意見可 Email 到 hello@firm13.com 或在 App Store 留言。

us.releaseNotes: Play The Game of Life 2 face-to-face with your friends wherever you are, with in-game video chat! Spin the spinner and share the fun and laughter every step of the way!
us.description:
Live 1000 lives in the official sequel to the classic family board game, The Game of Life! Will you be a Video Blogger or an Astronomer? Play now!

Voted "Best Digital Board Game” in the Pocket Gamer Awards 2021
Played by over 50 Million Families Worldwide

Customise your peg, hop in your eco car and race your friends and family through The Game of Life 2! It’s a contemporary sequel to the classic family favourite board game, The Game of Life. With an added crossroad moment and new ways to win, what will you choose? Earn points for Knowledge and Happiness as well as Wealth. Go to College, or don’t. Get married early, save it for later, or stay single! Have kids, adopt pets, do both or neither. The choices are all yours, and every decision counts!

Features

The Game of Life 2 digital board game is the award-winning sequel to the original Hasbro board game, The Game of Life.
• A GAME FOR UP 4 PLAYERS - Join 3 of your favourite people and live your dreams
• *NEW*  VIDEO CHAT AND PLAY - Live every life face-to-face with in-game video chat
• AN AD-FREE GAME - Enjoy the complete game with no interruptions
• 6 TRANSLATIONS - English, French, Spanish, German, Italian and Brazilian Portuguese
• SINGLE PLAYER - Take on our challenging AI
• ONLINE MULTIPLAYER - Connect with fans, or invite friends and family to a private game
• PASS & PLAY - No internet? No problem! Pass a single device between players for a wifi-free experience

How to play

CUSTOMISE your character
Customise your pink, blue or newly available purple peg with a style all of your own.

SPIN THE SPINNER
The game starts with a big decision. Will you go to College or straight into work? In this classic simulation, what will your friends and family choose?

It’s your LIFE PATH
Get married or don’t, have kids, adopt pets, or both! Work as a Pet Groomer, then qualify and become a Wind Turbine Technician! The choices are yours!

More WAYS TO WIN
Earn points for every choice you make! Every choice increases your wealth, happiness or knowledge, so every decision is valid.

RETIRE your way
Continue living the life of your dreams! Relax in a luxury home, or hit the road and fulfil your bucket list! Unlike the classic board game, you can choose to venture on!

Earn REWARDS to UNLOCK new items
Unlock new pegs, outfits and vehicles by playing the game and earning rewards!

In-game Video Chat
Recreate the magic! Gather around the board with in-game video chat in Online Multiplayer Mode. It’s super easy to set-up and play:

• Create your free private account
• Invite your friends and family to chat groups
• Start games straight from those chats
• Play face-to-face wherever you are

It’s simple, seamless fun for everyone.

The Ultimate Life Collection
Venture into a collection of 10 amazing fantasy worlds. Live life in enchanted worlds, make friends with dinosaurs in the Age of Giants and launch into the futuristic Lunar Age! Every new world features new Outfits, Vehicles, Jobs, Properties and more!

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Cartoon or Fantasy Violence
us.description:
********************
This grand adventure, unfolding over three generations, is now available to play in the palm of your hand!
Take your place among a family of heroes, sharing in all the triumphs and tragedies of their storied lives!

Enjoy three generations’ worth of adventure in one standalone package!
There will be a fee to download the game but download it once, and there’s nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download!
*In-game text is available in English only.
********************

◆Prologue
Our hero begins the story as a small boy, travelling the world with his father, Pankraz.
Over the course of his many adventures, this lovable lad learns and grows.
And when he finally becomes a man, he resolves to continue his father’s unfinished quest—to find the Legendary Hero...

This thrilling tale on a stunning scale can now be enjoyed on pocket-sized devices!

◆Game Feature
・Make Friends with Mighty Monsters!
The fearsome monsters you face in battle can now become your friends, giving you access to unique spells and abilities—and a whole host of strategic possibilities!

・Converse Freely with your Fellow Party Members!
The party chat function allows you to converse freely with the cast of colourful characters who will accompany you on your adventure. So don’t hesitate to turn to them for advice and idle chit-chat whenever the urge assails you!

・360-Degree Views
Rotate your viewpoint in towns and villages through a full 360 degrees to make sure you don’t miss a thing!

・AI Battles 
Tired of giving orders?  Your faithful companions can be instructed to fight automatically!
Use the various tactics at your disposal to see off even the toughest enemies with ease!

・The Casino
With slot machines, poker, the monster arena and the exciting slime races of the slurpodrome, the casino is sure to provide you with a little light relief when the pressures of adventuring prove too great.
Better still, you can exchange the tokens you earn for all kinds of exciting items, making taking a break well worth your while!

・Treasures ‘n’ Trapdoors
Take dice in hand and roll your way around specially designed game boards, enjoying a whole range of exciting events as you go!
Some of the things you’ll see won’t be available anywhere else, and if you manage to make it to the end, you can win some really great rewards!

・Bruise the Ooze is Back!
Bruise the Ooze, the slime-smashing minigame introduced in the Nintendo DS version, is back with a bang! Tap the slimes within the time limit to earn points in this super-simple yet fiendishly addictive goo-splatting extravaganza!

・Simple, Intuitive Controls
The game’s controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play.

・Experience the legendary RPG loved by millions in Japan and worldwide! Created by a legendary trio with the master creator Yuji Horii, the revolutionary synthesizer score and orchestration by Koichi Sugiyama, and art by master manga artist Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball). 
--------------------
[Supported Operating Systems]
iOS11.0 and above.

[Supported Devices]
iPhone 5S/iPod touch (6th Generation)/iPad (5th Generation) and above.

us.description:
********************
The game that started the legend of DRAGON QUEST is here at last for mobile devices!
Discover the RPG that won the hearts of two generations!

Enter a fantasy world of sword, magic, and monsters in one standalone package!
Download it once, and there’s nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download!
********************

◆ Prologue
The peace of fair Alefgard has been shattered by the appearance of the nefarious master of the night known as the Dragonlord, and the Sphere of Light which for so long kept the forces of darkness in check has been stolen!
It’s time for you, a young warrior through whose veins flows the blood of the legendary hero Erdrick, to set out on a quest to vanquish the Dragonlord, and save the land from darkness!

◆ Game Features
・First in the Legendary Series
Originally released as Dragon Warrior, you can now experience the classic retro RPG experience that swept up millions of Japanese players back in the Eighties...and never let go!
Become the descendant of the legendary hero Erdrick, and embark on an epic journey through the historic realm of Alefgard, tackling fearsome foes and perplexing puzzles on your way to the dread Dragonlord’s lair!

・Simple, Intuitive Controls
The game’s controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play.

・Experience the legendary RPG loved by millions in Japan and worldwide! Created by a legendary trio with the master creator Yuji Horii, the revolutionary synthesizer score and orchestration by Koichi Sugiyama, and art by master manga artist Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball). 

--------------------

・iPhone 4 and Above/iPad/iPod touch (4th Generation and Above)
・iOS5.1.1 and Above

◆ Prologue
A century has passed since the events of DRAGON QUEST, during which time three new nations have been founded by the offspring of the great hero of Alefgard.
But the peace they have long enjoyed is no more. Demon hosts summoned forth from the darkness by the fallen High Priest Hargon have brought the land to the brink of ruin once again.
Now, the young prince of Midenhall—a descendant of the legendary warrior Erdrick—must set out to find the two other heirs to the heroic bloodline so that together they might defeat the nefarious Hargon and restore peace to their world.

◆ Game Features
・Whether you’re keen to pick up where the first part of the Erdrick Trilogy left off, or are entirely new to the series, DRAGON QUEST II: Luminaries of the Legendary Line is sure to take you on an unforgettable journey.

・In this early example of an open-world adventure, players are free to wander the wilds, brave monster-infested dungeons, or take to the seas in search of new lands—discovering ever more powerful abilities and valuable treasures along the way!

・Simple, Intuitive Controls
The game’s controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play.

・Experience the multi-million selling series, beloved both in Japan and beyond, and see how the masterful talents of series creator Yuji Horii first combined with the revolutionary synthesizer sounds of Koichi Sugiyama and the wildly popular manga illustrations of Akira Toriyama to create a gaming sensation.

◆ Supported iOS Devices/Operating Systems ◆
・iPhone 4 and above/iPad/iPod touch (4th generation and above)
・iOS4.3 and above

us.description:
Rediscover the joy of the original Backyard Baseball 1997! Build your roster from the iconic cast of 30 characters stacked with charming personalities and witty banter, and get the edge on the competition with power-ups, fireball pitches, super strength, and Pablo Sanchez!
Play pick-up games, practice batting, and compete in single games or a whole season with simple, intuitive controls that anyone can master!
Game Modes:
Random Pick-up: A quick way to jump right in! The computer chooses a random team for you and itself, and the game starts immediately.
Single Game: You take turns with the computer to choose players from a random pool of characters.
Season: You create a team and manage it through a 14 game series. The opposing teams are computer generated. At the end of the season the best two teams advance to the BBL playoffs (best of 3). The winner advances to the championship series which consists of the Super Entire Nation Tournament (best of 3) and then the Ultra Grand Championship of the Universe Series (best of 5)!
Batting Practice: Choose a batter and face Mr. Clanky for some batting practice. This is where you’ll learn just when to click to make your chosen batter hit that ball!
T-ball - Select T-ball mode for more accessible game play. Simply click to hit, run, and field!
 
BACKYARD BASEBALL RULES
The rules for Backyard Baseball are a hybrid of Pro and Little League rules:
No leading off
No Injuries
Bunting is allowed
Tagging up is allowed
Stealing is allowed
 
At our core, we are fans first–not just of video games but of the Backyard Sports franchise. Fans have asked for accessible and legal ways to play their original Backyard titles for years, and we are excited to deliver. Without having access to the source code, there are hard limitations on the experience we can create. Backyard Baseball '97 runs buttery smooth for iOS devices, looks better than ever, and creates a new installation for digital preservation within the Backyard Sports catalog that allows the next generation of fans to fall in love with the title that started it all.

BALANCE RISK & REWARD
Balance risk and reward as your make your choices! Push your luck to grow your build, but don't overestimate your abilities, or your run could end on the spot. Navigate the dungeon wisely and reap the rewards to optimize your build to crush the dungeon with 10+ unique characters!​

PLAY WITH FRIENDS

Please note that extra controllers are required to play with others.

us.description:
SkySafari makes stargazing a simple pleasure. It has the largest database of any astronomy app, includes every comet, asteroid, satellite & solar system object ever discovered, offers unparalleled accuracy, advanced planning and logging tools, flawless telescope control, and provides the very best experience under the stars when you depend on it. Don’t postpone joy. Discover why SkySafari is the #1 recommended astronomy app for serious amateur astronomers since 2009.

Here's what’s new in version 7:

+ Complete support for iOS 18 and iPhone 16. Version 7 brings a new and immersive stargazing experience.

+ Events Finder - go to the new Events section to unlock a powerful search engine that finds astronomical events visible tonight and far into the future. The finder dynamically generates a listing of moon phases, eclipses, planetary moon events, meteor showers and planetary phenomenon such as conjunctions, elongations and oppositions.

+ Notifications - the notifications section has been completely revamped to allow you to customize and manage which events trigger an alert notification on your device.

+ Telescope Support - telescope control is at the heart of SkySafari.  Version 7 takes a giant leap forward by supporting ASCOM Alpaca, INDI & StarSense Explorer.  These next generation control protocols allow you to effortlessly connect to hundreds of compatible astronomical devices.

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!

https://www.livesky.com/privacy.html

tr.trackCensoredName: 紫白飛星萬年曆 - 十三行作品
tr.trackName: 紫白飛星萬年曆 - 十三行作品
tr.description:
"紫白飛星萬年曆 - 十三行作品" 為玄學愛好者與專業人士設計，提供詳細的紫白飛星資料和豐富的傳統中國曆法資訊。新版增強了公眾假期顯示、書簽功能，提供更加精準的風水佈局。

• 紫白飛星資訊：詳細列出年、月、日、時的紫白飛星。
• 男女命卦：提供男女命卦資訊，提升風水佈局準確性。
• 書簽功能：允許將多個日期加入書簽，方便比較和查看。
• 顯示所選日期的四柱：包括年、月、日、時干支，支援早夜子設定。
• 節氣變化明細顯示：詳細列出節氣前後紫白飛星的變化，幫助用戶更準確地進行安排和決策。
• 當月節氣時間顯示：清晰展示重要的節氣變化。
• 公眾假期顯示：支持中國、香港、台灣、新加坡的公眾假期資訊，幫助您更有效選擇吉日。
• 西曆及農曆日期搜尋及轉換功能：支持1850至2150年間的西曆與農曆轉換。
• 多語言介面：提供繁體中文和簡體中文選項。
• 設定：北(坎)方向、飛星顏色、排列方式的設定選項。
• 日期四柱算法：可設定早夜子。
• 日飛星計算法依據傳統歌訣: 日家紫白不難求，二十四氣六宮周，冬至陽生前後節，順行甲子一宮移， 雨水便從七宮起，谷雨還從四綠推，陰生夏至九宮逆，處暑前後三碧是， 霜降六宮起甲子，順逆分明十二支，有是何星當值日，移入中宮順逆飛。

歡迎提供意見可 Email 到 hello@firm13.com 或在 App Store 留言。

tr.description:
********************
This grand adventure, unfolding over three generations, is now available to play in the palm of your hand!
Take your place among a family of heroes, sharing in all the triumphs and tragedies of their storied lives!

Enjoy three generations’ worth of adventure in one standalone package!
There will be a fee to download the game but download it once, and there’s nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download!
*In-game text is available in English only.
********************

◆Prologue
Our hero begins the story as a small boy, travelling the world with his father, Pankraz.
Over the course of his many adventures, this lovable lad learns and grows.
And when he finally becomes a man, he resolves to continue his father’s unfinished quest—to find the Legendary Hero...

This thrilling tale on a stunning scale can now be enjoyed on pocket-sized devices!

◆Game Feature
・Make Friends with Mighty Monsters!
The fearsome monsters you face in battle can now become your friends, giving you access to unique spells and abilities—and a whole host of strategic possibilities!

・Converse Freely with your Fellow Party Members!
The party chat function allows you to converse freely with the cast of colourful characters who will accompany you on your adventure. So don’t hesitate to turn to them for advice and idle chit-chat whenever the urge assails you!

・360-Degree Views
Rotate your viewpoint in towns and villages through a full 360 degrees to make sure you don’t miss a thing!

・AI Battles 
Tired of giving orders?  Your faithful companions can be instructed to fight automatically!
Use the various tactics at your disposal to see off even the toughest enemies with ease!

・The Casino
With slot machines, poker, the monster arena and the exciting slime races of the slurpodrome, the casino is sure to provide you with a little light relief when the pressures of adventuring prove too great.
Better still, you can exchange the tokens you earn for all kinds of exciting items, making taking a break well worth your while!

・Treasures ‘n’ Trapdoors
Take dice in hand and roll your way around specially designed game boards, enjoying a whole range of exciting events as you go!
Some of the things you’ll see won’t be available anywhere else, and if you manage to make it to the end, you can win some really great rewards!

・Bruise the Ooze is Back!
Bruise the Ooze, the slime-smashing minigame introduced in the Nintendo DS version, is back with a bang! Tap the slimes within the time limit to earn points in this super-simple yet fiendishly addictive goo-splatting extravaganza!

・Simple, Intuitive Controls
The game’s controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play.

・Experience the legendary RPG loved by millions in Japan and worldwide! Created by a legendary trio with the master creator Yuji Horii, the revolutionary synthesizer score and orchestration by Koichi Sugiyama, and art by master manga artist Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball). 
--------------------
[Supported Operating Systems]
iOS11.0 and above.

[Supported Devices]
iPhone 5S/iPod touch (6th Generation)/iPad (5th Generation) and above.

tr.description:
********************
The game that started the legend of DRAGON QUEST is here at last for mobile devices!
Discover the RPG that won the hearts of two generations!

Enter a fantasy world of sword, magic, and monsters in one standalone package!
Download it once, and there’s nothing else to buy, and nothing else to download!
********************

◆ Prologue
The peace of fair Alefgard has been shattered by the appearance of the nefarious master of the night known as the Dragonlord, and the Sphere of Light which for so long kept the forces of darkness in check has been stolen!
It’s time for you, a young warrior through whose veins flows the blood of the legendary hero Erdrick, to set out on a quest to vanquish the Dragonlord, and save the land from darkness!

◆ Game Features
・First in the Legendary Series
Originally released as Dragon Warrior, you can now experience the classic retro RPG experience that swept up millions of Japanese players back in the Eighties...and never let go!
Become the descendant of the legendary hero Erdrick, and embark on an epic journey through the historic realm of Alefgard, tackling fearsome foes and perplexing puzzles on your way to the dread Dragonlord’s lair!

・Simple, Intuitive Controls
The game’s controls are designed to work perfectly with the vertical layout of any modern mobile device, and the position of the movement button can be changed to facilitate both one- and two-handed play.

・Experience the legendary RPG loved by millions in Japan and worldwide! Created by a legendary trio with the master creator Yuji Horii, the revolutionary synthesizer score and orchestration by Koichi Sugiyama, and art by master manga artist Akira Toriyama (Dragon Ball). 

--------------------
◆ Supported iOS Devices/Operating Systems ◆

Filca is SLR Film Camera
35 film filters and cinematic effects bring your photos to life.

@veteranUser
"Without Filca, you're just collecting moments
with Filca, you're preserving memories."

Master your shots with Filca's expert-level manual controls.

■ Shutter speed, ISO, white balance control in Manual mode
■ 35mm film filters from industry leaders like Kodak, Fuji, Agfa

Filca is designed to optimize your snapshot experience. 
It's perfect for taking photos of people, self-portraits, night scenes, and capturing the subtle beauty of everyday life. 
Apply our filters to achieve an authentic analog film appearance.

Main Features:
* Auto mode camera with 35mm film filter
* Manual mode (Exposure and Focus)
* Full control over shutter speed, ISO
* Various aspect ratios: 4:3, 3:2, 16:9, 1:1
* Digital zoom up to 8x magnification
* Manual Focus Control (macro, landscape)
* 35mm film filter from Fuji, Kodak, Agfa (including black and white filter)
* Film Grain Effect
* Film Date Printing Effect
* Optical Image Stabilization
* Low Power Mode
* Selfie Mode
* EXIF Data Storage (including location data)
* Portrait Enhancements
* Full Resolution Photo
* Timer and Flash Function
* Grid Mode View

Pro Features:
* White Balance Adjustment Function
* Date Print Function

Share your photos on Instagram using #filca We look forward to featuring your work.
Follow us on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/filca.app/

Privacy Policy: https://han.gl/Wclkw

Let us elevate your photography journey with Filca.

tr.description:
From the creators of the award winner, Kingdom Rush saga comes the most extraordinary space odyssey. Fight challenging real-time strategy sci-fi battles on amazing and unknown planets. Command brave soldiers, mighty mechas, and powerful aliens against hordes of space monsters, swarms of insectoids, and robot armies in a galaxy far far away.

PLAN, ATTACK AND BEAT ALL THE ENEMIES ADAPTING YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of the combat, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers.

ADAPT YOUR STRATEGY by changing the role of your troops even in the thick of battle, from ranger to sniper, from flamethrowers to missile launchers.

RECRUIT AND TRAIN THE GREATEST HEROES in the galaxy, lead them into dangerous territory against near-impossible odds and unleash their mighty powers and abilities.

TURN THE TIDE OF BATTLE with orbital strikes, intelligent mines, support troops, turrets and a wide array of special weapons.

Armies of robots, crushed starships, gigantic monsters, unknown races, brave assaults, desperate rescues, audacious sabotages... the galaxy needs your command.

The galaxy needs the Iron Marines

FEATURES

• 21 CAMPAIGN MISSIONS across three sci fi planets. Each action-packed challenge will have you improve your strategy to save the galaxy!
• 17 SPECIAL OPERATIONS that will test if you have what it takes to battle your way through space.
• 40+ UPGRADES to build the ultimate RTS army! Choose between Defense Drones, Napalm Rockets, Ricocheting Blasts, Lethal Weapons and many more.
• +7 UNITS to bring into battle and give your hero some extra firepower!
• 8 SPECIAL WEAPONS to unleash hell on your enemies and keep expanding your tactics like space itself! What’s better than a well-placed missile? An orbital strike of 50 high-explosive missiles!
• DEFEAT UNIQUE BOSSES in epic battles. They are green, mean, killing machines!!! Well… some are machines and these aliens aren’t green… but they’re all massive and determined to crush you. Suit up, Marines!
• 70+ ACHIEVEMENTS to complete and show everyone you’re the best RTS commander in the whole galaxy!
• NO WI-FI IN SPACE? No worries, offline play guaranteed!
• CHOOSE YOUR DIFFICULTY MODE: Casual, Normal or Veteran. Don’t get cocky! Or Do! Your choice!
• IMPOSSIBLE MODE. Only for the most daring, reckless, all-out-of-bubblegum marines in space. We dare you!

SkySafari 7 brings social stargazing to mobile devices with two new features to help you connect with other like minded people.

OneSky - allows you to see what other users are observing, in real time.  This feature highlights objects in the sky chart and indicates with a number how many users are observing a particular object.

SkyCast - allows you to guide a friend or group around the night sky through their own copy of SkySafari. After initiating SkyCast, you can generate a link and conveniently share it with other SkySafari users via text message, apps or social media accounts.

+ Sky Tonight -  jump to the new Tonight section to see what’s visible in your sky tonight.  Expanded information has been designed to help plan your night and includes  Moon & Sun info, calendar curations, events and the best positioned deep sky and solar system objects.

+ Improved Observation Tools - SkySafari is the perfect tool to help you plan, record and organize your observations.  New workflows make it easier to add, search, filter and sort data.

+ Home Screen and Lock Screen Widgets  keep your favorite astro information at your fingertips.

The Small Touches:

+ You can now edit the Jupiter GRS Longitude Value in the Settings.
+ Better Moon Age calculation.
+ New grid & reference options allow you to display Solstice and Equinox markers, Orbit + Node markers for all solar system objects, and tick marks and labels for the Ecliptic, Meridian, and Equator reference lines.
+ Previous In-app Purchases are Now Free -  this includes the H-R diagram, 3D Galaxy view, and the PGC galaxy and GAIA star catalogs. Enjoy.
+ Many more.

If you haven't used SkySafari 7 Pro before, here's what you can do with it:

+ Hold your device up, and SkySafari 7 Pro will find stars, constellations, planets, and more!

+ Simulate the night sky up to 5MM years in the past or future! Animate meteor showers, conjunctions, eclipses, and other celestial events.

+ Control your telescope, log and plan your observations.

+ Optionally backup all of your observing data in our secure cloud storage and make it easily accessible to multiple devices as well as from our new web interface, LiveSky.com.

+ Augmented Reality (AR) mode

+ Night Vision.

+ Orbit Mode. Leave the Earth’s surface behind, and fly through our solar system.

+ Galaxy View shows the position of deep sky objects in our Milky Way!
